message:
The item order quantity exceeds the maximum order quantity due to the dynamic final stock.

Formula to calculate the dynamic final / high stock: Classification Mean * Weighting factor (see right)

Formula to calculate the maximum order quantity due to the dynamic final stock: Dynamic final stock â€“ Used presentation stock + Demand for stock period
reasons:
Very high order quantities could lead to very high stock values due to the occurrence of several simultaneous effects:

  • Large logistic units
  • Fill-up settings
  • Order restrictions
  • Minimum stock value is too high
  • Positive trend
  • Promotions
  • Price reductions
  • High static presentation stock
actions:
• Cut the order
  • Decrease static presentation stock
  • Check logistic units
  • Check minimum order quantity
  • Check minimum stock value
  • Check promotion times
params:
Weighting factors for detecting the dynamic high stock in C_CONFIG:

Excpt.FinalStockWeight.FS1

Excpt.FinalStockWeight.FS2

Excpt.FinalStockWeight.SS1

Excpt.FinalStockWeight.SS2
